tools.title: DL-Powered Surface Crack Assessment
tools.description: Deep Learning model for pixel-level segmentation of complex surface cracks.

tools.title: VLM-Assisted Surface Crack Assessment
tools.description: Vision–language model–assisted surface crack assessment using Gemini for image understanding and pixel-level crack delineation.

tools.title: Rut Depth Measurement
tools.description: Automated lane boundary detection and multi-algorithm rut depth measurement (AASHTO, Wire, Straight-Edge).

tools.title: Layer Interface Annotation
tools.description: Interactive tool for annotating layer interfaces in GPR for the assessment of layer thickness and deficiency assessment.

tools.title: Layer Interface Detection
tools.description: Deep learning models for pixel-level segmentation of pavement layer interfaces using GPR data, supporting automated layer thickness evaluation and deficiency assessment.

tools.title: Subsurface Crack Detection
tools.description: Deep Learning model for object detection and localizing subsurface cracks from GPR data, supporting subsurface assessment.

tools.title: Auto-PASER
tools.description: An LLM-driven qualitative assessment engine for automated pavement condition evaluation and standardized PASER rating generation.

tools.title: Integrated Performance Assessment
tools.description: Integrated multi-criteria decision-making (MCDM) models for pavement performance assessment considering surface and subsurface conditions across multiple performance criteria.

tools.title: Synthetic Distress Dataset Generator
tools.description: A generative AI–based tool for creating fully annotated synthetic pavement crack datasets to mitigate limited labeled data.

tools.title: Synthetic Experts
tools.description: A tool to generate high-fidelity synthetic expert datasets for pavement engineering decision-making.
